awards.text: Won 1 Golden Globe. Another 13 wins & 6 nominations.

fullplot: Ludovic is a transgender girl who is coming out. She talks of marrying her neighbor's son and can not understand why everyone is so surprised about it. Her family and neighbors struggle with her actions.
plot: Ludovic is a transgender girl who is coming out. She talks of marrying her neighbor's son and can not understand why everyone is so surprised about it. Her family and neighbors struggle ...
title: Ma Vie en Rose
